divs: sighting detailsmy girlfriend and i saw a red\orange ball moving slowly in the sky yesterday near the castlefun park area in abbotsford - bc - canada, right above highway one. it was a red\orange dot, quite large, almost the size of a airplane light. completely silent, and steady in the sky, not as tall as where airplanes would fly. the red light dropped a little red light after about 30-40 seconds. the little red light faded away as it fell. then, the big red light moved to the right and a little (star sized) fire color dot came off it. the red light faded away, and the little fire color dot moved away, first east, then it made a big circle and started heading west very fast while losing altitude, until it disappeared near a farm land in that region. we turned around and went into that farm, shut the headlights, but could not see anything at all. very freaky! date: october 31st 2011 exactly at 10:33 pm please dont post my name. just the report.
Summary: red/orange ball moving slowly in the sky
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
